line_1: Tell yon guid bluid o' auld Boconnock's,
line_2: I'll be his debt twa mashlum bonnocks,

line_1: Tell yon guid bluid o' auld Boconnock's,
line_2: An' drink his health in auld Nanse Tinnoch's.

line_1: Tell yon guid bluid o' auld Boconnock's,
line_2: If he some scheme, like tea an' winnocks,
